title: Anvil
desc:
Post 2226
- When stood on, you may combine any two cards in your hand that have the same sets of colors. The resulting card will have their post numbers added together, and will let you use both cards' effects at the same time, while still counting as 1 card in your hand.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card requires 3 hits to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card takes a hit whenever any player uses its effect.
